content: of jingle bell insert k hook into the yarn loop just formed and pull it through the loop already on hook chain 1 2 double_crochet in same shell chain-2 space skip the last 2 dcs of shell double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * around end slip_stitch in top of beginning chain-3 fasten yarn turn stocking right side out fold cuff towards you making sure that it is folded between the single_crochet and double_crochet rounds keeping chain-12 loop folded down into stocking so that it does not get caught in finishing round finish top of cuff attach white yarn to center back between dcs chain 1 single_crochet in same space and in each space between dcs around fasten yarn weave in ends for a different look assemble stocking by placing wrong sides together and join by working scs around you may also add 1 or 2 rounds of red or contrasting color to squares to make a larger stocking © 2006 beverly button http //www buttonspecialties com
